DisplayName.cs_CZ: Aktualizace správce rozšíření Adobe Extension Manager CS5.5
DisplayName.de_DE: Update für Adobe Extension Manager CS5.5
DisplayName.es_ES: Actualización de Adobe Extension Manager CS5.5
DisplayName.fr_FR: Mise à jour d’Adobe Extension Manager CS5.5
DisplayName.it_IT: Aggiornamento di Adobe Extension Manager CS5.5
DisplayName.ja_JP: Adobe Extension Manager CS5.5 アップデート
DisplayName.pl_PL: Aktualizacja programu Adobe Extension Manager CS5.5
DisplayName.pt_BR: Atualização do Adobe Extension Manager CS5.5
DisplayName.zh_CN: Adobe Extension Manager CS5.5 更新
DisplayName.zh_TW: Adobe Extension Manager CS5.5 更新

Description.en_US: This update addresses a critical issue in Extension Manager that prevents InDesign extensions from being imported in OS X Mountain Lion (10.8).
Description.cs_CZ: Tato aktualizace opravuje závažnou chybu v aplikaci Extension Manager, která v systému OS X Mountain Lion (10.8) brání v importu rozšíření aplikace InDesign.
Description.da_DK: Denne opdatering retter et kritisk problem i Extension Manager, som forhindrer InDesign-udvidelser i at blive importeret i OS X Mountain Lion (10.8).
Description.de_DE: Dieses Update behebt das kritische Problem in Extension Manager, das unter OS X Mountain Lion (10.8) ein Importieren von InDesign-Erweiterungen verhindert.
Description.es_ES: Esta actualización corrige un problema grave en Extension Manager que evita que las extensiones de InDesign se importen a OS X Mountain Lion (10.8).
Description.fi_FI: Tämä päivitys ratkaisee Extension Managerissa ilmenevän kriittisen ongelman, joka estää InDesign-laajennusten tuonnin OS X Mountain Lioniin (10.8).
Description.fr_FR: Cette mise à jour est destinée à régler un problème majeur dans Extension Manager qui empêche l'importation des extensions InDesign dans OS X Mountain Lion (10.8).
Description.hu_HU: Ez a frissítés egy kritikus hibát javít ki az Extension Manager programban, amely megakadályozza az InDesign-kiterjesztések importálását OS X Mountain Lion (10.8) rendszeren.
Description.it_IT: Questo aggiornamento risolve un problema critico di Extension Manager che impedisce l'importazione delle estensioni di InDesign in OS X Mountain Lion (10.8).
Description.ja_JP: このアップデートは、InDesign の拡張機能が OS X Mountain Lion (10.8) に読み込まれるという Extension Manager の重要な問題に対応します。
Description.ko_KR: 이 업데이트는 Extension Manager에서 OS X Mountain Lion(10.8)으로 InDesign 확장을 가져오지 못하는 중요한 문제를 다룹니다.
Description.nb_NO: Denne oppdateringen retter en kritisk feil i Extension Manager som hindrer InDesign-tilleggsmoduler i å bli importert i OS X Mountain Lion (10.8).
Description.nl_NL: Deze update verhelpt een ernstig probleem in Extension Manager waardoor InDesign-extensies niet kunnen worden geïmporteerd in OS X Mountain Lion (10.8).
Description.pl_PL: Ta aktualizacja rozwiązuje problem o znaczeniu krytycznym w programie Extension Manager, uniemożliwiający importowanie rozszerzeń programu InDesign w systemie OS X Mountain Lion (10.8).
Description.pt_BR: Esta atualização corrige problemas críticos no Gerenciador de extensões que impedem a importação das extensões do InDesign para o X Mountain Lion (10.8).
Description.ro_RO: Această actualizare soluţionează o problemă critică din Extension Manager care împiedică importul extensiilor InDesign în Mountain Lion OS X (10.8).
Description.ru_RU: Данное обновление исправляет критическую неполадку Extension Manager, не позволяющую импортировать расширения InDesign в OS X Mountain Lion (10.8).
Description.sv_SE: Den här uppdateringen åtgärdar ett kritiskt problem i Extension Manager som förhindrar att InDesign-tillägg importeras i OS X Mountain Lion (10.8).
Description.tr_TR: Bu güncelleme Extension Manager'da bulunan ve InDesign uzantılarının OS X Mountain Lion (10.8) işletim sisteminde içe aktarılmasını engelleyen önemli bir soruna yöneliktir.
Description.uk_UA: Це оновлення виправляє критичну помилку в Extension Manager, через яку неможливо імпортувати розширення InDesign в OS X Mountain Lion (10.8).
Description.zh_CN: 此更新解决了 Extension Manager 中的一个严重问题，该问题会导致无法在 OS X Mountain Lion (10.8) 中导入 InDesign 扩展。
Description.zh_TW: 此更新修正一個 Extension Manager 中的嚴重問題，這個問題會使 InDesign 擴充功能無法在 OS X Mountain Lion (10.8) 中匯入。
